title: How the Box Office Success of 'Hamnet' Sparked Sales of the Novel
desc: The box office success of 'Hamnet' has created interest in Maggie O'Farrell's novel, helping sales increase sevenfold.

title: Man, 30, charged with 2nd-degree murder after deaths of 2 women in West End Winnipeg fire
desc: A 30-year-old man has been charged with second-degree murder in connection with the deaths of two women in a fire in Winnipeg's West End over the weekend.

title: Dispute over West Bank football pitch sparks international campaign
desc: A campaign to save a West Bank football pitch from demolition has gone global. The sport's most powerful bodies, as well as social media influencers, have intervened to pressure Israeli authorities to reconsider its destruction.

title: Highlights of Wednesday, February 11 at the Milano Cortina 2026 Olympic Games
desc: Italy climbs to thirteen medals at Milano Cortina 2026 thanks to gold in the luge doubles and bronze in the mixed doubles curling. France wins in the women's biathlon individual and in ice dancing, while Switzerland celebrates Franjo von Allmen's third gold in the men's SuperG.

title: France's Beaudry, Cizeron win Olympic ice dance gold in upset
desc: France's Laurence Fournier Beaudry and Guillaume Cizeron put in a nearly flawless performance to edge out American stars Madison Chock and Evan Bates for Olympic gold in the ice dance Wednesday night in Milan.

title: 1 Liverpool (Feb 11, 2026) Game Analysis
desc: Expert recap and game analysis of the Sunderland vs. Liverpool English Premier League game from February 11, 2026 on ESPN.

title: Will incoming owner move Trail Blazers out of Portland? Oregon governor Tina Kotek has thoughts
desc: Kotek said proposal puts state "in the ballpark" of what it will take to keep the Trail Blazers from moving.

title: Man City coast to close gap on Arsenal - while resting Erling Haaland for second half

title: Winter Olympics 2026: Japan’s Hirano Ayumu perseveres through fractured hip to stay in the fight for snowboard halfpipe gold
desc: Reigning Olympic champion has battled to make it to Milano Cortina 2026, where he goes into the halfpipe final “without knowing how much pain will come.”
